UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Aurein-derived antimicrobial peptides formulated with pegylated phospholipid micelles to target methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus skin infections.
Literature.Author: Kumar P, Pletzer D, Haney EF, Rahanjam N, Cheng JJT, Yue M, Aljehani W, Hancock REW, Kizhakkedathu JN, Straus SK

Literature.Title: Enzymatically releasable polyethylene glycol - host defense peptide conjugates with improved activity and biocompatibility
Literature.Author: Drayton M, Alford MA, Pletzer D, Haney EF, Machado Y, Luo H, Overall CM, Kizhakkedathu JN, Hancock REW, Straus SK

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:15% Hemolysis=50 µg/ml,Human PBMC:30% Cytotoxicity=50 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300 LAC(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=16µg/ml)
